This app underlies the terms and conditions of the GNU General Public License v3.0.\nFor more detailed information read this: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html Belarus Chess is a non-profit private project. If you want to contribute to this project with creative ideas then just connect me via email :) E-Mail: bobrchess@gmail.com
This apps needs the rights to write all events on your external storage! This apps needs the rights to read the events from your external storage! Error - Can\'t access your external storage! Error - Something went wrong when trying to write to your external storage! Error - Something went wrong when trying to read from your external storage!
Events successfully saved Events successfully imported
Trying to rewrite save-file with current events!
Saving events Importing events This is going to try to import all your events from your external storage path.\n\nIf this fails, check if the event data exists in the following path: %1$s/belaruschess This is going to save all your event data in clear-text on your external storage. From there you can retrieve the data at any time. This will not save any images.\nIf your external storage is a SD-Card you can import the data from different phones.\n\nData path: %1$s/belaruschess
Why use this app? How can I add a tournament? Why should I confirm my personal data? Which app updates are coming? How can I support you as a developer? My notifications does not pop up properly This apps purpose is to remind the user about his tournaments, annual events and anniversaries in a very simple and easy way.\nBut why not just use already existing facebook tournaments or google calendar?\nFor this app you do not need to create a Facebook account (in fact you do not need any kind of account). Also zero unnecessary ads or pop-ups like in other notification apps.\nAnother important thing is privacy. This app stores all your tournament and event data only locally on your phone. No one can read/ edit your data - except yourself - and everything is private. Tournament events provide the possibility to save a person\'s birth date together with nice little features like setting the birth year to calculate the person\'s age and setting a unique image for customization purposes of the person\'s tournament page. This app reminds you every year about the persons tournament. Annual events can be every event which occur yearly. Like anniversaries or special parties. You can set a date together with the start year of this yearly event. This way the app calculates since when the event occurs (which is handy for anniversaries). This app reminds you every year about the event. One-time events are special events which only take place once in the future. The day after the event, all data about it are deleted. This type of event could be future exam or graduation dates or just something you should really not forget and want to be reminded about. For me developing apps and programs for other people is great. It is even more fun when people actually like your stuff or can contribute to your project in a productive way.\nIf you like this app and want to support me, there are lots of different ways of doing so. The simplest way would be to rate this app in the app store ;)\nIf you are a developer you could try to check out my GitHub (see \'About\') and contribute to this project.\nBut if you want, you could also donate to my PayPal (https://www.paypal.me/Procrastimax) page, so I can afford more coffee for my next app :) When you encounter the problem, that your event notifications does not \"pop up\" properly. Go to your notification settings on your android device and check the notification settings for this app. In some cases you have to give this app a higher priority or you have to set the \"Banner - Show above status bar\" setting (if existent).
